content: समस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To throw or bring together, put together, unite, combine, <ls>Ms. 3. 85</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 57.</ls> {@--2@} To join in a compound, compound. {@--3@} To take collectively or jointly; समस्तैरथ वा पृथक् <ls>Ms. 7. 198</ls> ‘jointly or severally.’ {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To be compounded, form or enter into a compound; अव्ययं समर्थेन सह समस्यते सोऽ व्ययीभावः <ls>Sk.</ls>
